question: Match the following:
columnB: Male partner withdraws his penis from the vagina just before ejaculation
Day 10 to 17 of the menstrual cycle when ovulation could be expected
As long as the mother breast-feeds the child fully, chances of conception are almost nil
By abstaining from coitus during this period

answer.Fertile period: Day 10 to 17 of the menstrual cycle when ovulation could be expected
answer.Withdrawal or coitus interruptus: Male partner withdraws his penis from the vagina just before ejaculation
answer.Lactational amenorrhea method: As long as the mother breast-feeds the child fully, chances of conception are almost nil
answer.Conception prevention during fertile per: By abstaining from coitus during this period

question: Match the following:
columnA: Maximum effective period of lactational amenorrhea
Chances of failure in natural methods
columnB: Chances of failure are high
Side effects are almost nil
Effective only upto a maximum period of six months following parturition
Ovum and sperms are prevented from physically meeting with the help of barriers

answer.Maximum effective period of lactational: Effective only upto a maximum period of six months following parturition
answer.Barrier methods: Ovum and sperms are prevented from physically meeting with the help of barriers

question: Match the following:
columnB: Popular brand of condom for the male
Used to cover the penis in the male or vagina and cervix in the female just before coitus
Protect the user from contracting STIs and AIDS
Disposable, can be self-inserted and give privacy to the user

answer.Condoms: Used to cover the penis in the male or vagina and cervix in the female just before coitus
answer.‘Nirodh’: Popular brand of condom for the male
answer.Female condoms: Disposable, can be self-inserted and give privacy to the user
answer.Benefit of condoms: Protect the user from contracting STIs and AIDS

question: Match the following:
columnB: Reusable
Inserted into the female reproductive tract to cover the cervix during coitus
Used along with barriers to increase their contraceptive efficiency
Prevent conception by blocking the entry of sperms through the cervix

answer.Function of rubber barriers: Inserted into the female reproductive tract to cover the cervix during coitus
answer.Spermicidal creams, jellies and foams: Used along with barriers to increase their contraceptive efficiency
answer.Use with rubber barriers: Prevent conception by blocking the entry of sperms through the cervix

question: Match the following:
columnA: One child norm mostly adopted by
columnB: 21 years
Young, urban, working couples
18 years
Hum Do Hamare Do

question: Match the following:
columnA: Method that does not interfere with sexual drive
Contraceptive measures taken to tackle population problem
columnB: Easily available, effective and reversible
Natural/Traditional, Barrier, IUDs, Oral contraceptives, Injectables, Implants and Surgical methods
User-friendly with no or least side-effects
Incentives given to couples with small families

answer.Barrier methods fall under: Natural/Traditional, Barrier, IUDs, Oral contraceptives, Injectables, Implants and Surgical methods
answer.Method that does not interfere with sexu: User-friendly with no or least side-effects
answer.Contraceptive measures taken to tackle p: Incentives given to couples with small families

question: Match the following:
columnB: Avoiding chances of ovum and sperms meeting
Day 10 to 17 of the menstrual cycle
When ovulation could be expected
Avoid coitus during ovulation period

answer.Natural method working principle: Avoiding chances of ovum and sperms meeting
answer.Periodic abstinence period: Day 10 to 17 of the menstrual cycle

question: Match the following:
columnB: Lippes loop
CuT, Cu7, Multiload 375
Progestasert, LNG-20
Doctors or expert nurses

question: Match the following:
columnA: Hormone releasing IUDs effect on uterus
Hormone releasing IUDs effect on cervix
columnB: Suppress sperm motility and the fertilising capacity of sperms
Make the uterus unsuitable for implantation
Make the cervix hostile to the sperms
Females who want to delay pregnancy and/or space children

answer.Cu ions in IUDs function: Suppress sperm motility and the fertilising capacity of sperms
answer.Hormone releasing IUDs effect on uterus: Make the uterus unsuitable for implantation
answer.Hormone releasing IUDs effect on cervix: Make the cervix hostile to the sperms
answer.IUDs suitable for: Females who want to delay pregnancy and/or space children
